identificationModule.briefTitle: Reversal of Battle-Related Aging (ROBRA) in a Special Operations Forces Cohort
identificationModule.officialTitle: Reversal of Battle-Related Aging (ROBRA) in a Special Operations Forces Cohort

descriptionModule.briefSummary: The purpose of this study is to examine measures of GrimAge clock in SOF members undergoing treatment for PTSD/TBI using CSB.
descriptionModule.detailedDescription:
The primary objective of this study is to assess the impact of a combined protocol of subanesthetic ketamine infusions (SKI) and bilateral cervical sympathetic blocks (CSB) on aging, as measured by the GrimAge epigenetic clock.

The secondary objective of this study is to assess the impact of this treatment paradigm on PTSD and mental health, as measured over a 6 month time period using the following questionnaires: Post-traumatic Stress Disorder Checklist (PCL-5), Patient Health Questionnaire 9 (PHQ-9), Depressive Symptom Index-Suicidality Subscale (DSI-SS), Generalized Anxiety Disorder 7-item (GAD-7), and Neurobehavioral Symptom Inventory (NSI).

The tertiary objectives of the study are to investigate if PTSD is associated with significantly reduced free testosterone levels and increased C-reactive protein (CRP) levels.

interventions.name: subanesthetic ketamine infusions and bilateral cervical sympathetic blocks
interventions.description: Combined protocol of subanesthetic ketamine infusions and bilateral cervical sympathetic blocks

primaryOutcomes.measure: Change from baseline in Epigenetic Aging at 15 days
primaryOutcomes.description: GrimAge epigenetic clock tool to assess DNA methylation

primaryOutcomes.measure: Change from baseline in Epigenetic Aging at 90 days
primaryOutcomes.description: GrimAge epigenetic clock tool to assess DNA methylation

primaryOutcomes.measure: Change from baseline in Epigenetic Aging at 180 days
primaryOutcomes.description: GrimAge epigenetic clock tool to assess DNA methylation

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Change from baseline in Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD) symptoms at 15 days
secondaryOutcomes.description: Post-traumatic Stress Disorder Checklist (PCL-5), a 20-item self-report measure yielding a total symptom severity score between 0 and 80.

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Change from baseline in Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD) symptoms at 90 days
secondaryOutcomes.description: Post-traumatic Stress Disorder Checklist (PCL-5), a 20-item self-report measure yielding a total symptom severity score between 0 and 80.

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Change from baseline in Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD) symptoms at 180 days
secondaryOutcomes.description: Post-traumatic Stress Disorder Checklist (PCL-5), a 20-item self-report measure yielding a total symptom severity score between 0 and 80.

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Change from baseline in Depression at 15 days
secondaryOutcomes.description: Patient Health Questionnaire 9 (PHQ-9), a 9-item self-report measure yielding a depression severity score between 0 and 27.

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Change from baseline in Depression at 90 days
secondaryOutcomes.description: Patient Health Questionnaire 9 (PHQ-9), a 9-item self-report measure yielding a depression severity score between 0 and 27.

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Change from baseline in Suicidal Ideation at 15 days
secondaryOutcomes.description: Depressive Symptom Index-Suicidality Subscale (DSI-SS), a 4-item self-report measure yielding a suicidal ideation severity score between 0 and 12.

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Change from baseline in Suicidal Ideation at 90 days
secondaryOutcomes.description: Depressive Symptom Index-Suicidality Subscale (DSI-SS), a 4-item self-report measure yielding a suicidal ideation severity score between 0 and 12.

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Change from baseline in Suicidal Ideation at 180 days
secondaryOutcomes.description: Depressive Symptom Index-Suicidality Subscale (DSI-SS), a 4-item self-report measure yielding a suicidal ideation severity score between 0 and 12.

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Change from baseline in Anxiety at 15 days
secondaryOutcomes.description: Generalized Anxiety Disorder 7-item (GAD-7), a 7-item self-report measure yielding an anxiety severity score between 0 and 21.

secondaryOutcomes.description: Generalized Anxiety Disorder 7-item (GAD-7), a 7-item self-report measure yielding an anxiety severity score between 0 and 21.

eligibilityModule.studyPopulation: This study will include 20 individuals, recruited from SOF with an active duty history of at least 5 years. Subjects may be in active duty or retired, male and female, between the ages of 40 and 60 years old. The participants must have a confirmed diagnosis of PTSD.
